text: Era'i tara-nabiganera madhya theke yaderake allaha taâ€™ala neyamata dana karechena. Era adamera bansadhara ebam yaderake ami nuhera sathe naukaya arohana kariyechilama, tadera bansadhara, ebam ibrahima o isara'ilera bansadhara ebam yaderake ami patha pradarsana karechi o manonita karechi, tadera bansodbhuta. Tadera kache yakhana dayamaya allahara ayatasamuha patha kara hata, takhana tara sejadaya lutiye parata ebam krandana karata.
